div.span:
Owner marked as is_paid=true
Org status: free

Free Plan
• Max 3 users
• Max 3 projects
• Limited features

User selects plan & quantity
in frontend

🔑 Lifetime Pro
Manual DB Update:
• prem_status = 'pro'
• subscription_id = NULL

User pays for initial seats
(e.g., $120 for 3 seats)

update_org_subscription()
• Mark ALL members as paid
• Set prem_status = 'pro'
• Set subscription_id

🎁 Lifetime Pro Active
• Unlimited features
• No billing cycles
• No Stripe integration

accept_org_invite()
• New member: is_paid=true
• Update Stripe quantity

remove_from_org()
• Delete user_org record
• Update Stripe quantity

accept_org_invite()
• New member: is_paid=true
• NO Stripe update (subscription_id=NULL)

remove_from_org()
• Delete user_org record
• NO Stripe update (subscription_id=NULL)

Monthly Billing Cycle
End of subscription period

Usage Costs
• Tokens: quantity ÷ 1000 × $0.02
• Spans: quantity × $0.001

Schedule new subscription
to start when legacy ends

💎 Lifetime Billing
• No monthly charges
• No usage billing
• Unlimited everything
• Zero cost forever
